name: Pong, But Terrible
description:
Welcome to the 2nd greatest game of all time. You're taking the role of a hamburger bun behind the kitchen, and your goal is to capture the pig as much as you possibly can.

It's two-player, and the first to 10 points wins.

p1 controls: W, D(Up and Down)

p2 controls: Arrow Keys(Up and Down)
